Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Capital City in 1968...
Injured on 8/21/1968 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 7/10/1969 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 4/21/1971 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 7/22/1972...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 8/21/1972, off Gene Thor (CI)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1973, winning 2 games with a 0.56 ERA...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1975, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1975, winning 2 games with a 0.51 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1975, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1976, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1977, winning 2 games with a 0.51 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by Northeastern on 2/2/1978 to a 5-year deal worth $10,000,000 per year...
Struck out 15 batters against Toledo on 9/27/1978...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1979, winning 2 games with a 0.51 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1979, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1979, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1980, going 4-0, 0.41...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1980, going 23-9, 1.72 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1981, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1981, winning 2 games with a 1.08 ERA...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/25/1983 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
